title: Through Kyoto Streets: Run, Melos! and Four Other Stories - Novel Updates
tags: Collection of Short Stories   Modern Day   Parody   Writers
author: Morimi Tomihiko   森見登美彦
description: Morimi takes on the classics! Five reimagined masterworks of Japanese literature come to life once more on the streets of Kyoto. From burlesque depictions of friendship to thought-provoking explorations of ambition and solitude, Morimi brings the classics into the modern age with his signature wit and unmistakable style.>
